item.title: Auntie add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Auntie add a quote by Bill Bryson
item.description: "Not one of your pertinent ancestors was squashed, devoured, drowned, starved, stranded, stuck fast, untimely wounded, or otherwise deflected from its life's quest of delivering a tiny charge of genetic material to the right partner at the right moment in order to perpetuate the only possible sequence of hereditary combinations that could result -- eventually, astoundingly, and all too briefly -- in you." -- Bill Bryson

item.title: Auntie add a quote by Katharine Hepburn
item.description: "The thing about life is that you must survive. Life is going to be difficult, and dreadful things will happen. What you do is move along, get on with it, and be tough. Not in the sense of being mean to others, but being tough with yourself and making a deadly effort not to be defeated." -- Katharine Hepburn
